GSD.impact: Information disclosure of all environmental variables
GSD.description: In Hyperledger fabric-samples version Prior to commit 6bccc138887b3dbd9dc920bad200068b11066ef7 a temporary file creation (CWE-379) exists in the digibank.sh and magnetocorp.sh that can be attacked via Local resulting in Information disclosure of all environmental variables
